title: Kesha’s Got Her Balls Back, to Release New Music Coming Soon
text:
Photo: JEROD HARRIS/Getty Images for LOVELOUD Festival

Animals, come uncaged! Rattle the metal bars that hold you captive and screech, for your queen is coming! After a heartbreaking battle with her producer (and alleged abuser), Dr. Luke, and a heartwarming return to music with Rainbow, Kesha is back and she’s already talking about balls, so you know it’s going to be good. “Yall deserve to know first…..New Music Is Coming VERY Soon!!!!” she tweeted, along with portraits drenched in yellow. “So excited! Spoiler alert - I Got My Ball’s Back.” Fans in the replies have already changed their Twitter profile pictures to new golden photos, where Kesha wears a diamond tiara with a mannequin hand nesting upon it, covered in gold, blood, and what looks like a plastic fish. There’s the Kesha we know and love, here to reclaim “Tik Tok” and save us all.

ANIMALS!!!! yall deserve to know first.....New Music Is Coming VERY Soon!!!! So excited! Spoiler alert - I Got My Ball's Back☠️👾👽 pic.twitter.com/IgshTrsLVX — kesha (@KeshaRose) September 26, 2019
description: Pop star Kesha tweeted that she has new music in the works and on its way! Plus, she shares a spoiler.
